messages.title: A better future for Cardiff West
messages.content: I live in Cardiff West and have been proud to represent our constituency at your MP. The many people I meet in Cardiff West tell me they want an MP who understands and shares their hopes for the future, not remote Westminster politicians.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Abolish the unfair Tory Bedroom Tax
Increase the minimum wage to Â£8
Fight to bring jobs and investment to Cardiff West

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been a great honour to represent Cardiff West. Let's continue the hard work.

contactInformation.address: 305 Cowbridge Road East, Canton, Cardiff CF5 1JD

quotes.text: "It has been a great honour to represent Cardiff West. Let's continue the hard work."

images.caption: Kevin Brennan, Your Labour Parliamentary Candidate
